page.title: 03Canal Jobs in Woodlesford
page.content: Mr.Copley and Mr.Clarkson both work for the British Water ways but they both have different jobs.Mr.Copley used to be a diver.He used to dive in the canal to remove rocks and rubbish so the boats didn't get stuck,and to repair the locks below water level.Now he is a lenghts man.Most of the time he works keeping repairs up to date reinforcing the sides and dredging the bottom.Mr.Clarkson is a lock keeper.He has to cut the grass and paint the windows.He makes sure the grass cutter is in working order,and all the lock controls as well.He sometimes forgets and the gates open and shut all the time.
